lead_paragraph: Khari Noerdlinger, whose mother, Rachel Noerdlinger, was once chief of staff for Chirlane McCray, is charged in the fatal stabbing of a 16-year-old.

headline.print_headline: Former Aide’s Son  Pleads Not Guilty
headline.main: Son of Ex-Aide to Mayor de Blasio’s Wife Pleads Not Guilty in Killing

snippet: Khari Noerdlinger, whose mother, Rachel Noerdlinger, was once chief of staff for Chirlane McCray, is charged in the fatal stabbing of a 16-year-old.
abstract: Khari Noerdlinger, whose mother Rachel Noerdlinger once worked for New York City's first lady Chirlane McCray, pleads not guilty in fatal stabbing of 16-year-old Savion Lewallen in Edgewater, NJ.
